hero.title: Discover Hot GitHub Repositories Effortlessly
hero.subtitle: Our tool helps you find trending and relevant GitHub projects based on keywords, sorting, and filters.

keywordSearch.title: Keyword Search
keywordSearch.description: Search repositories by name, description, README, and topics using one or more keywords.

sortingOptions.title: Flexible Sorting
sortingOptions.description: Sort results by Stars, Forks, last update time, or GitHub's best match algorithm.

resultControl.title: Result Count Control
resultControl.description: Specify the number of top repositories you want to retrieve (e.g., top 10, 50, 100).

dataExtraction.title: Comprehensive Data Extraction
dataExtraction.description: Get key information for each repo: full name, URL, description, Stars, Forks, language, update/creation time, topics, and license.

csvExport.title: CSV Export
csvExport.description: Export search results to a CSV file for further analysis and offline use.

howItWorks.title: How to Use the GitHub Repo Finder

step1.title: Enter Keywords
step1.description: Input your search terms to find relevant repositories.

step2.title: Set Filters & Sort
step2.description: Choose sorting options and specify the number of results you need.

step3.title: Analyze Results
step3.description: Review the extracted information for each repository.

step4.title: Export Data (Optional)
step4.description: Save your findings as a CSV file for detailed analysis.

appPreview.title: Tool Preview
appPreview.description: See how the GitHub Popular Repo Discovery Tool works and simplifies your search for top repositories.

user1.quote: This tool saved me hours of manual searching on GitHub. I found the perfect library for my project in minutes!
user1.name: Alex P., Software Engineer

user2.quote: The CSV export feature is fantastic for my research. I can easily analyze trends in open-source projects.
user2.name: Sarah K., Tech Researcher

user3.quote: As a product manager, staying updated on new tech is crucial. This discovery tool is now part of my weekly workflow.
user3.name: Mike B., Product Manager

case1.title: Tech Stack Selection
case1.description: Quickly find and compare frameworks or libraries for your next project.

case2.title: Market Research
case2.description: Identify trending technologies and popular tools in specific domains.

case3.title: Learning & Contribution
case3.description: Discover well-maintained projects to learn from or contribute to.

seo.title: GitHub Popular Repo Discovery Tool | Find Trending Projects
seo.description: Efficiently discover popular and trending GitHub repositories with our advanced search and filtering tool. Ideal for developers, researchers, and product managers.
seo.keywords: github, repository, popular, trending, discovery, developer tools, open source, project finder, code search, tech trends
